mapper.select: SELECT c.no, c.pno, c.quantity, c.color, p.sname, p.price, p.color AS colorList FROM cart AS c INNER JOIN product AS p ON (c.pno = p.`no`) WHERE c.uno = #{no} AND sdata = "S"
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE no = #{no};
UPDATE cart SET color = #{color} WHERE no = #{no};
